<script>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
    // Script to override listing hyperlinks behaviour, forcing to open them on new tab
    const container = document.querySelector('#listing-listing');
    if (container) {
      const links = container.querySelectorAll('a');
      links.forEach(link => {
        link.setAttribute('target', '_blank');
      });
    }

    // Script to change elements order (first projects list, then contributions)
    const listing = document.getElementById("listing-listing");

    const sections = ["other-contributions", "presentations", "events-organization"];

    if (listing) {
      const parent = listing.parentNode;
      sections.forEach(id => {
        const el = document.getElementById(id);
        if (el) parent.append(el);
      });
    }
  });
</script>
